ygData.subject: Jonathon's provacation
ygData.msgSnippet: I didnt do any timings, but oh my was I fast with this song!  I twisted, lvl 45 Jonathons, the lvl 51 Largos and lvl 47 Nivs. From a purely subjective
ygData.messageBody:
I didnt do any timings, but oh my was I fast with this song! I twisted, lvl
45 Jonathons, the lvl 51 Largos and lvl 47 Nivs.

From a purely subjective standpoint it felt like I was attacking twice as
fast. My only thought now is that I need to get a FBSS, hangman's noose or
something, as I finally have a NEED for a haste item!

I tested on a blue petrafier cockatrice wielding a Martune rapier(primary)
and a SSOY and kicked some bardic ass! I ended the fight a little under two
bubbles damaged. Without this new song, i would have gotten rode hard and
sent home wet!

Lago Bardoon of Bertoxx
51 Minstrel
Guild Leader, Defenders of Aleria
